excerpt: "The technique will unlock new potential in everyday consumer electronics. Catanzaro's claim is made by possible by DLSS 3, the latest version of Nvidia's DLSS (Deep Learning Super Sampling). It combines AI-powered image upscaling with a new feature exclusive to DLSS 3: optical multiframe generation."
